00034 #include <stdio.h>
00035 #include <conio.h>

00039 /*---- globals -----------------------------------------------------*/
00040 
00041 typedef struct {
00042    unsigned short io_base;
00043    unsigned short gain[16];
00044 } DAS1600_SETTINGS;
00045 
00046 #define DAS1600_SETTINGS_STR "\
00047 IO Base = WORD : 0x240\n\
00048 Gain = WORD[16] :\n\
00049 1\n\
00050 1\n\
00051 1\n\
00052 1\n\
00053 1\n\
00054 1\n\
00055 1\n\
00056 1\n\
00057 1\n\
00058 1\n\
00059 1\n\
00060 1\n\
00061 1\n\
00062 1\n\
00063 1\n\
00064 1\n\
00065 "

00067 /*---- device driver routines --------------------------------------*/
00068 
00069 INT das1600_init(HNDLE hKey, void **psettings, INT channels, DWORD type)
00070 {
00071    int status, size;
00072    HNDLE hDB;
00073    DAS1600_SETTINGS *settings;
00074 
00075    /* allocate info structure */
00076    settings = calloc(1, sizeof(DAS1600_SETTINGS));
00077    *psettings = settings;
00078 
00079    cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
00080 
00081    /* create settings record */
00082    status = db_create_record(hDB, hKey, "", DAS1600_SETTINGS_STR);
00083    if (status != DB_SUCCESS)
00084       return FE_ERR_ODB;
00085 
00086    size = sizeof(DAS1600_SETTINGS);
00087    db_get_record(hDB, hKey, settings, &size, 0);
00088 
00089 #ifdef OS_WINNT
00090    /* open IO address space */
00091    status = ss_directio_give_port(settings->io_base, settings->io_base + 0x0F);
00092    if (status != SS_SUCCESS) {
00093       cm_msg(MERROR, "das1600_init", "DirectIO device driver not installed");
00094       return FE_ERR_HW;
00095    }
00096 #endif
00097 
00098    return FE_SUCCESS;
00099 }
00100 
00101 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00102 
00103 #define AD0     (unsigned short) (settings->io_base+0x00)
00104 #define AD1     (unsigned short) (settings->io_base+0x01)
00105 #define MUX     (unsigned short) (settings->io_base+0x02)
00106 #define DIO     (unsigned short) (settings->io_base+0x03)
00107 #define DA0LB   (unsigned short) (settings->io_base+0x04)
00108 #define DA0HB   (unsigned short) (settings->io_base+0x05)
00109 #define DA1LB   (unsigned short) (settings->io_base+0x06)
00110 #define DA1HB   (unsigned short) (settings->io_base+0x07)
00111 #define STATUS  (unsigned short) (settings->io_base+0x08)
00112 #define CTRL    (unsigned short) (settings->io_base+0x09)
00113 #define GAIN    (unsigned short) (settings->io_base+0x0b)
00114 
00115 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00116 
00117 INT das1600_get_analog(DAS1600_SETTINGS * settings, INT channel, float *pvalue)
00118 {
00119    unsigned short int data;
00120    double volts;
00121 
00122 //###
00123 //*pvalue = (float) (channel/10.0);
00124 //return FE_SUCCESS;
00125 
00126    /* set MUX channel */
00127    _outp(MUX, channel | (channel << 4));
00128 
00129    /* diable interrupts and DMA */
00130    _outp(CTRL, 0);
00131 
00132    /* set gain */
00133    _outp(GAIN, settings->gain[channel] == 1 ? 0 :
00134          settings->gain[channel] == 10 ? 1 :
00135          settings->gain[channel] == 100 ? 2 : settings->gain[channel] == 500 ? 3 : 0);
00136 
00137    /* start conversion */
00138    _outp(AD0, 0);
00139 
00140    /* wait for conversion */
00141    do {
00142       data = _inp(STATUS);
00143    } while (data & 0x80);
00144 
00145    data = _inpw(AD0);
00146 
00147    /* convert to volts assuming bipolar operation */
00148    volts = ((data >> 4) - 2048.0) / 4096.0;
00149 
00150 
00151    volts = volts * (10 - (-10)) / settings->gain[channel];
00152 
00153    /* return volts */
00154    *pvalue = (float) volts;
00155 
00156    return FE_SUCCESS;
00157 }
00158 
00159 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00160 
00161 INT das1600_set_analog(DAS1600_SETTINGS * settings, INT channel, float voltage)
00162 {
00163    signed short int data;
00164 
00165    /* assume +-10 V bipolar range */
00166 //  data = (unsigned short int) (voltage / 10.0 * 2048 + 2048.5);
00167 
00168    /* assume +10 V unipolar range */
00169    data = (unsigned short int) (voltage / 10.0 * 4096);
00170 
00171    /* check if in range */
00172    if (data > 4095)
00173       data = 4095;
00174    if (data < 0)
00175       data = 0;
00176 
00177    if (channel == 0)
00178       _outpw(DA0LB, (unsigned short) (data << 4));
00179    else
00180       _outpw(DA1LB, (unsigned short) (data << 4));
00181 
00182    return FE_SUCCESS;
00183 }

00185 /*---- device driver entry points ----------------------------------*/
00186 
00187 INT das1600_ai(INT cmd, ...)
00188 {
00189    va_list argptr;
00190    HNDLE hKey;
00191    INT channel, status;
00192    float *pvalue;
00193    void *info;
00194 
00195    va_start(argptr, cmd);
00196    status = FE_SUCCESS;
00197 
00198    switch (cmd) {
00199    case CMD_INIT:
00200       hKey = va_arg(argptr, HNDLE);
00201       info = va_arg(argptr, void *);
00202       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00203       status = das1600_init(hKey, info, channel, DF_INPUT);
00204       break;
00205 
00206    case CMD_GET:
00207       info = va_arg(argptr, void *);
00208       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00209       pvalue = va_arg(argptr, float *);
00210       status = das1600_get_analog(info, channel, pvalue);
00211       break;
00212 
00213    default:
00214       break;
00215    }
00216 
00217    va_end(argptr);
00218 
00219    return status;
00220 }
00221 
00222 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00223 
00224 INT das1600_ao(INT cmd, ...)
00225 {
00226    va_list argptr;
00227    HNDLE hKey;
00228    INT channel, status;
00229    float value;
00230    void *info;
00231 
00232    va_start(argptr, cmd);
00233    status = FE_SUCCESS;
00234 
00235    switch (cmd) {
00236    case CMD_INIT:
00237       hKey = va_arg(argptr, HNDLE);
00238       info = va_arg(argptr, void *);
00239       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00240       status = das1600_init(hKey, info, channel, DF_OUTPUT);
00241       break;
00242 
00243    case CMD_SET:
00244       info = va_arg(argptr, void *);
00245       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00246       value = (float) va_arg(argptr, double);
00247       status = das1600_set_analog(info, channel, value);
00248       break;
00249 
00250    default:
00251       break;
00252    }
00253 
00254    va_end(argptr);
00255 
00256    return status;
00257 }
